name: cleanuparr
description: Cleanuparr is a self-hosted web application designed to automate cleanup tasks for cloud services or local environments. It focuses on removing unused artifacts to save costs and improve performance.
features: Automated Cleanup: Remove unused artifacts automatically. Save resources.
Cloud & Local: Works with cloud services and local environments. Flexible operation.
Cost Savings: Reduce storage costs by removing waste. Optimize spending.
Performance Boost: Improve system performance by cleaning up. Faster operation.
Scheduled Tasks: Automate cleanup on custom schedules. Set and forget.
Self-Hosted: Run cleanup automation on your infrastructure. Complete control.
